info.tagline: Working at the intersection of web development & design

about.title: I specialize in front-end development. Being independent, I work with small to large companies, startups, design studios, and creative individuals globally.
about.paragraph: Designed to save time while maintaining a strong visual presence on various social media channels, these templates feature a perfect blend of classic and contemporary styles.
